code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{verifyProofOnChain}from"../utils/generateProof";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Authenticate=()=>{const[proof,setProof]=useState(null);const handleFileUpload=event=>{const file=event.target.files[0];const reader=new FileReader();reader.onload=e=>setProof(JSON.parse(e.target.result));reader.readAsText(file);};const handleAuthentication=async()=>{if(!proof){alert("Upload your proof.json file!");return;}const result=await verifyProofOnChain(proof);alert(result?"✅ Authentication Success!":"❌ Authentication Failed!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Authenticate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:".json",onChange:handleFileUpload}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAuthentication,children:"Authenticate"})]});};export default Authenticate;
